Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18375018]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=8 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=45 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.18375018]IC50 = 100 μM against rat red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against the Gram-positive bacterium B. subtilis and Gram-negative bacterium E. coli. PDD-A also shows hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: New potent antimicrobial peptides from the venom of Polistinae wasps and their analogs.
Literature.Author: Cerovský V, Slaninová J, Fucík V, Hulacová H, Borovicková L, Jezek R, Bednárová L.
